name: Access Service Coordination - Exchange Company
title: ASC-EC
definition: Identifies the ICSC code of the Access Service Coordination - Exchange Company (ASC-EC)whenever an access service passes through more than one provider territory.
usageNotes: Required when multiple providers are involved in   providing access service and the EVCI field is not   equal to “B”.
Required when the JPR field is populated.
fieldNotes: An entry in this field indicates that a Multi-EC   Form must be associated with this access service   request.
